column1: The eket was a short stabbing sword wielded by the Númenóreans. It was described as "a short stabbing sword with a broad blade
column3: from a foot to one and a half feet long."

column1: Isildur carried one on his way to Arnor. While escaping the Disaster of the Gladden Fields
column2: he retained the eket after discarding the rest of his war gear to swim across Anduin .

column1: The swords description is similar in many ways to the Wikipedia:Gladius carried by Roman legionnaires.
